response.original_title: Such Is The Real Nature Of Horses
response.overview: Such Is The Real Nature of Horses is the culmination of 20 years of research by Robert Vavra. The documentary film, which is based off a book of the same name, is introduced by Jane Goodall and William Shatner.
response.tagline: Jane Goodall, William Shatner, Horses, Wild Horses, Robert Vavra
response.title: Such Is The Real Nature Of Horses
